title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4204.9 - Policing of grounds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4204.9 - Policing of grounds

State Regulations

Each licensee shall police its grounds at all times and
preclude admission of any authorized persons in and around the stables, paddocks or other security areas. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4204.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
